title: Chocolate Oreo Cookie Review - Oreo Oration
description:
Can the chocolate creme reign supreme?

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE / BUY A SHIRT: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review: http://www.youtube.com/user/gameovergreggy?sub_confirmation=1

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Check out the Oreo Oration FAQ: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aO6zw2LeJ3c&list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&index=1

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: What's up everybody Welcome to Oreo Oration I'm Greg Miller and while you are out living your life and building cat houses or whatever it is you do the fine people over at Oreo were making endless variations of milk's favorite cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like the video and subscribe to my Channel today we're reviewing chocolate Oreos now this is I know we're back to a crazy cream week we we like to have little weeks here on what we're doing we had peanut butter on on Wednesday and peanut butter was a colossal disaster which was so surprising cuz fudge cream peanut butter scored a 9.0 fudge cream chocolate also scored a 9.0 what's it going to Happen or no I'm sorry Golden the Golden cookie with the chocolate scored a 9.0 what's going to happen here so we start our test like we always do with the first look through the sealed package there we go that's a nice

Golden the Golden cookie with the chocolate scored a 9.0 what's going to happen here so we start our test like we always do with the first look through the sealed package there we go that's a nice presentation very nice looking very uniform no no no Little Things No Breaks nothing good looking things let's smell them it's chocolatey I bet you expected that moving on to the second part of our review process the taste test H now as viewers of Oreo Oration know I'm a big fan of the chocolate cookie chocolate creme I came to like with the Golden Cookie it made sense here the cream mixes with the chocolate cookies and gives them a different taste it doesn't taste like your traditional chocolate cookie like traditional Oreo can there be too much of a good thing ladies and gentlemen we're about to find out let's go to the milk pairing here of course a huge part of any Oreo see how this guy absorbs one two three okay it's weird yeah the the cookie itself is being lost because of the

about to find out let's go to the milk pairing here of course a huge part of any Oreo see how this guy absorbs one two three okay it's weird yeah the the cookie itself is being lost because of the overpowering chocolate cream and then it's really sweet and especially in the aftertaste the cookie itself absorbed the milk very well of course Chocolate Cookies continue to knock that one out of the park but yeah overall not happy with what I'm getting here so far let's go to the twist see how the twist goes twisting category poor form Chocolate Oreo come on I expect it better of course we give everybody the benefit of the doubt best of three competition twist okay that's a good one let's go to the final one here this is make or break for the Chocolate Oreo all right pretty good I'll take some of it back you twist fine you had you had your one bad twister that happens to everybody we have a solid Double Stuf but now it's time to assign a review score to this one and I tell you what ladies

of it back you twist fine you had you had your one bad twister that happens to everybody we have a solid double stuff but now it's time to assign a review score to this one and I tell you what ladies and gentlemen this is the further we get here on our Oreo Oration we're you know we're weeks and weeks in here it's getting harder and harder to actually score these guys ah man I mean twisting is all right milk pairing didn't work well it's too chocolate it's like it's not that I don't like chocolate it's just that two competing kinds of chocolate you're getting a weird taste that's too sweet I think I got to say five five on these guys not this is it's an interesting one too like we talked about it last time peanut butter did not fare well it got it got that flat five five for these they're a little bit better I still wouldn't recommend you go out and buy them maybe if you're a huge chocolate fan you got to try them though I understand so that's the way the cookie crumbles for chocolate

a little bit better I still wouldn't recommend you go out and buy them maybe if you're a huge chocolate fan you gotta try them though I understand so that's the way the cookie crumbles for chocolate Oreos but what do you think maybe you've tried them before if so leave your review as a video response below then like the video subscribe to my channel now here's the big thing am I missing any Oreos I'm sure I am let me know in the comments below what Oreo I you haven't seen reviewed on the show and where I can buy it then share the video with your friends please uh I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of cookies to review but until then keep on dunking
